ygData.subject: Re: Accelerando table update
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well i was almost positive that it gave me an xtra 4hps per tick with hymn, however another bard of the same lvl tried it out and said it didnt. So i might
ygData.messageBody:
At 07:18 AM 5/13/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: SteelWolf <steelwlf@...>
>
>I have the drum as well. Here's hard facts on the Mistmoore Battle Drum - same
>weight (0.5) as a hand drum, but definitely gives some increase in speed
>over the
>handdrum when using selo's, and a documentable feature would be when using
>either
>Guardian or Elemental Rhythms it boosts resist by 5 points MORE than a
>handdrum.
>
>What exactly is this noticable effect you refer to with the Lute of the Gypsy
>Princess? There is no difference at all with Hymn of Restoration, nor with any
>other song as far as I can tell. I am Level 27. Feel free to quntify your
>statement with something more useful then "it does extra stuff".
>
>Ariell Thunderwolf, Karana
>
>>

Well i was almost positive that it gave me an xtra 4hps per tick with hymn,
however another bard of the same lvl tried it out and said it didnt. So i
might have been getting confused with the natural healing rate, its a
little tricky to judge sometimes with the server actually *dropping* your
hps below what the client software thinks it is. So when the servers come
back up i plan on doing some testing. I hope im right, but its starting to
look like i am wrong. :(

PS check out the psalms if you havent, i havent seen any source mention
this but they give damage shields too. At least the psalm of warmth does, i
need to go pick up the rest of the psalms now :)


Gendal Concorden, lvl 40 Bard of Tunare
